name: pkcs11js

1.0.0.name: pkcs11js
1.0.0.description: A Node.js implementation of the PKCS#11 2.3 interface

1.0.3.name: pkcs11js
1.0.3.description: A Node.js implementation of the PKCS#11 2.3 interface

scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git ac && git pull --rebase && git push

1.0.4.name: pkcs11js
1.0.4.description: A Node.js implementation of the PKCS#11 2.3 interface

scripts.clean: rm -rf build/ buildjs/ coverage/ .nyc_output/ npm-debug.log npm-debug.log.*
scripts.pub: npm version patch && npm publish && git push
scripts.sync: git ac && git pull --rebase && git push
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run coveragehtml' lib/ src/ test/
scripts.predev: if [ ! -f coverage/index.html ]; then mkdir coverage; cp .waiting.html coverage/index.html; fi
